item.title: Why blogging?
item.description: I'm blogging again. I don't think geocities still exists today, and the perception of what blogging means has changed a few times over. I'm quite certain there's only maybe 1 in 200-500 chance you'll meet someone who knows what blog stands for, or what that meant originally. The term blog was short for weblog. It's a log, on the web. Not a marketing page or online diary. Back then blogging was an exclusive domain of nerds; hackers, webmasters & sysadmins.
